inclusion.criterion: Prolongation of prothrombin time > 3 seconds and bilirubin level > 2 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: HAV, HCV, HDV and HIV co-infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Drug, metabolic or alcohol as cause of hepatitis
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. Direct antiviral drugs were added to his treatment 6 months ago.
